transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Haa sir.
Good evening sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se, kisse baat kar rahe hai sir?
Hmm.
Actually sir Shubham se aapki baat hui thi abhi thodi der pehle aur after the call na aapko ek feedback jaata hai aapke WhatsApp pe. 
To usme aapne not satisfied mark kiya hua hai. 
To isliye mai Shubham ka manager baat kar raha hu isliye mere ko ye jaanna tha kya issue aa gaya sir? 
Discussion to aapka kaafi der hua Shubham se.
Haa discussion hua tha aisa kuch nahi hai wo wo aise hi chala gaya tha.
Achha sir wo to uski rating kharab hogi ladke ki.
Nahi nahi maine usko usko phone aaya. 
Sir ek kaam ek kaam kariega abhi aapka ye not satisfied aaya na matlab ab jab aapne not satisfied mark kiya na to rating wo ho jaati hai ticket open ho jaata hai.
To mai abhi ticket close karta hu aapko abhi feedback aayega aapke mail pe jo aapki registered email id hai. 
Waha par aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir, thik hai?
Thik hai.
Okay, thank you.
Nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' after call.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to mark 'satisfied' on email feedback.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, rating, satisfaction
